result.arabic_text: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ مِمَّا يَخۡلُقُ بَنَاتٖ وَأَصۡفَىٰكُم بِٱلۡبَنِينَ
result.translation: Ahubwo se (Allah) yakwigenera abakobwa mu biremwa bye,[1] maze mwe akabaha umwihariko w’abahungu?
result.footnotes: [1] Muri uyu murongo Allah aranenga imyumvire idahwitse yari ifitwe n’ababangikanyamana b’i Maka batishimiraga kubyara abakobwa nyamara bakabitirira Allah.
